overview.en: Polyient Games Governance Token (PGT) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Polyient Games Governance Token has a current supply of 20,000 with 17,731.69527684 in circulation. The last known price of Polyient Games Governance Token is 865.24592633 USD and is up 6.33 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 2 active market(s) with $12,442.29 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.polyient.games/.
